title: How to Draw Dicks w/ Barbara from RoosterTeeth -- Gregway Episode 13
description:
RoosterTeeth's Community Manager Barbara Dunkelman is known for two things: 1) Bad puns. 2) Drawing penises. Today, she shows Greg how to draw the perfect dick.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg as a video response and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

The Gregway playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe to RoosterTeeth: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=roosterteeth

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Follow Barbara on Twitter: http//www.twitter.com/blawndee

Follow RoosterTeeth on Twitter: http//www.twitter.com/roosterteeth
